revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WYR-G54 |revision= |upc=747464109251 |ean= |asin=B0003QIXBO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/06/2004 |manuf_country=China |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model=IP806SM |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=P27IP806SM |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510 |cpu1_cspeed=160 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800TTC-70 |fla1_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=Mosel Vitelic |ram1_model=V54C316162VCT6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8000 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=000D0BXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^000D0B[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:0D:0B |oui_eth=00:0D:0B }} [http://web.archive.org/web/20120617092319/http://www.buffalotech.com/files/downloads/WYR-G54%20Manual%20v4.pdf User manual] (via archive.org)
This device is a [[SerComm IP806SM]].
"4900MZ20" is silkscreened on a production unit's board. :This particualar board is using '''[[Capacitor brand used::TEAPO]]''' and '''[[Capacitor brand used::Sanyo]]''' capacitors.
The manual states the default SSID is the device's MAC address. :Per an actual unit, this is indeed correct - it is the standard '''Buffalo''' default SSID format.. :the MAC address of the device w/ no delimiters and upper case characters.
